report.title: Species counts by location using standard filter params
report.description: Lists locations with mappable boundary output and the number of taxa within them.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct o.taxon_meaning_id) as count FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false and lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN cache_occurrences o ON o.sample_id=ils.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# AND #sharing_filter# #filters# #idlist# ) ON ils.location_id=l.id WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# AND (l.public=true or lw.id IS NOT NULL) AND (l.code NOT LIKE ('%+%') OR l.code IS NULL) GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

column.name: value
column.sql: count || case '#valueSuffix#' when '' then '' else ' ' || '#valueSuffix#' end

column.name: fs
column.sql: case when count>1000 then #baseFontSize# else #baseFontSize#+1 end
